an5.151:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato sunantopi saddhammam abhabbo niyamam okkamitum kusalesu dhammesu sammattam.
an5.151:1.3: Katham paribhoti, kathikam paribhoti, attanam paribhoti, vikkhittacitto dhammam sunati, anekaggacitto ayoniso ca manasi karoti.
an5.151:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato sunantopi saddhammam abhabbo niyamam okkamitum kusalesu dhammesu sammattam.
an5.151:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato sunanto saddhammam bhabbo niyamam okkamitum kusalesu dhammesu sammattam.
an5.151:2.3: Na katham paribhoti, na kathikam paribhoti, na attanam paribhoti, avikkhittacitto dhammam sunati, ekaggacitto yoniso ca manasi karoti.
an5.151:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato sunanto saddhammam bhabbo niyamam okkamitum kusalesu dhammesu sammattan”ti.
